stories.text:
Hey there HN!

Who: We're a small team of designers and developers based in India, that decided to get together a few months ago and hack together a fun privacy focussed utility app.

What: www.jaadoo.ai - A privacy focussed way to search and manage your mobile screenshots. Our beta is available for both iOS and Android. For this version (which we are calling - P.C. Sorkar, as an ode to one of India's OG magicians) you can search mobile screenshots, tag them, delete them and share them. The app is free for upto 200 of your latest screenshots.

Ask: What can we do better? What features would you like to see on the next release?

Much love, Team Jaadoo.
stories.title: Show HN: We built an app to help search and manage your mobile screenshots

stories.text:
Hi HN, I have made a few more changes on Odown, and hope this will be useful for your business, - New integrations with third-party applications - New ping locations

For more information, please see the following link: https://odown.io/blog/changelog-opsgenie-telegram-discord-and-new-datacenter-locations

And if you have any suggestions or new features you want to find on Odown, please comment below or submit it directly on https://github.com/odown-io/public-roadmap/issues

Thanks ;)
stories.title: Show HN: New features added, your comments please
